sentence.Network_en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentence.Network_en: A 25 mile traffic jam clogged the northbound carriageway of the M6.
sentence.Network_cn: 长达25英里的交通拥堵阻塞了M6号高速公路的北行车道。

sentence.Network_en: Traffic is slow on the westbound carriageway of the M4.
sentence.Network_cn: M4号高速公路西向车道车流行驶缓慢。

entry.def: A carriageway is one side of a road on which traffic travelling in opposite directions is separated by a barrier.

means.word_mean: 1. one of the two sides of a motorway where traffic travels in one direction only usually in two or three lanes
